comments.body:
Unfortunately, we have to disable `make check`. There are two reasons.
1. Building and running the tests takes a long time so is impractical on CI when trying a matrix of Python and NumPy versions in the same build. Once these get split out it may be possible again.
2. The version of `clang` that we are using with the copy of XCode on the Mac VM has a [bug](https://llvm.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=21083). It has been fixed in later versions of `clang`, but those versions are available with copies of XCode that support 10.7.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +76,80 @@# For more details see here ( https://llvm.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=21083 ).
# Also, these tests are very intensive, which makes them challenging to run in CI.
#eval ${LIBRARY_SEARCH_VAR}=$PREFIX/lib make check
make install

comments.body: Ensure we are using `clang` on Mac and that we have C++11 support. Also, ensure that Mac OS 10.7 will be supported at bare minimum.
